content: 7th round join a to any chain 2 space with slip_stitch chain 1 does not count as first half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet in chain-2 space half_double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space around the square join with slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet 8th round chain 1 does not count as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet from previous round 3 half_double_crochet in corners slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet note while doing the half_double_crochet border on each square crochet right over yarn ends to avoid weaving in later make 15 squares in this manner for remaining 20 squares ~ with b work rounds 1-2 with a work rounds 3-8 no need to cut yarn after round 6 joining using color a and with right sides facing use a slip_stitch to join the squares see diagram for placement edging with right side of work facing you join a with a slip_stitch to any half_double_crochet chain 1 does not count as first half_double_crochet work 1 round of half_double_crochet evenly around entire afghan placing 5 half_double_crochet in corners join with slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet note this is a perfect time to crochet over any yarn ends you have from joining the squares use a yarn needle to weave in any remaining yarn ends and voila your la push blanket is complete design by ~ amanda lewis ravelry id ~ lewknitty
